contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 21, 2019 D Swiss Open
Swiss Open 0 March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest
swiss-open
Swiss Open Contest presented nearly 50 different Bands from 11 Countries in it's 25 Years of History till 2014. It was held in Kultur-Casino Bern first and since 1999 the 'Salle Blanche' in KKL Luzern provides a wonderful Frame for this popular Event.
See Also Contest Website: http://www.worldbandfestival.ch/ Switzerland
Set Test and Own Choice
Paganini Variations
Kultur und Kongresszentrum (KKL), Luzern, Switzerland 30th Edition
This Year Special Mode: Consisting of a Set Work (in the Morning) and a 2nd Test Piece, a Brass Classic (Afternoon). Drawn beforehand under notarial Supervision, no Band Choice. > Own Choice marks the Points for the 2nd Test Piece <
Valaisia Brass Band again absent due to Participation at British Open (qualified as European Champion 2018).
Commence: 09.00 am.
Best Soloist Set Work (Paganini): William Birrer - Euphonium, Treize Etoiles Best Set Work: Brass Band Treize Etoiles Best Test Piece 2: Brass Band Berner Oberland
May 2, 2017, 7:13 a.m. May 23, 2020, 9:26 a.m.
